Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Hey there! People are getting ready for the Federal Budget to be handed down later tonight. Treasurer Jim Chalmers has confirmed that it will project a surplus of $4 billion after Labor's efforts to improve the country's bottom line. Along with this surplus projection there are also discussions on the cost of living relief measures inflation and how these factors will affect the share market. Various programs on TV and presenters like Craig James from CommSec are covering updates on these topics.
